Title: Object: Papyrus Chester Beatty 17
Description: Papyrus Chester Beatty XVII (three fragments); Hieratic literary text recto. Extracts from the Satirical Letter of Hori.
Curator's comments: Published: Gardiner, Hieratic Papyri Vol. 1, p. 130, Vol. 2, Plate 72.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381077) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381077)
